author: The New York Sun
title: Ground News - Chief Rabbis Rebuke Pope Francis Over Gaza Comments, Call for Holy Father To ‘Atone for Sins’
text:
Summary by The New York Sun At issue is a phone call last month between His Holiness and Israel’s president, Isaac Herzog, during which the pope reportedly told Herzog that it is ‘forbidden to respond to terror with terror.’ Share menu More
